## RelationBDTO.createRelationship() method

Creates a new relation between two nodes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createRelationship(relation: RelationModel, checkRecursivity?: boolean): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  relation | [RelationModel](./clm-core.relationmodel.md) |  |
|  checkRecursivity | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Checks whether a recursive dependency exists in the graph |

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;
